data.title: Watch some versatile performances of actor Kishore before catching up with Thalamai Seyalagam
data.meta_description: Kishore, who has made a strong presence in films like Kantara, Arrambam, and others, has played a variety of roles across languages during his career
data.text:
Recently, the makers of ZEE5’s upcoming political thriller series Thalamai Seyalagam revealed the title poster and teaser. The series is directed by Vasanthabalan and is headlined by actor Kishore, who has appeared in versatile roles before. Kishore, who has made a strong presence in films like Kantara, Arrambam, and others, has played a variety of roles across languages during his career. Before Thalamai Seyalagam releases on May 17, here are some of Kishore films you can stream on OTTplay Premium.

Also read: OTTplay Awards 2022: Know your Winners – Kishore wins Best Actor in a Negative Role (Series) for She Season 2

Kishore films to watch before Thalamai Seyalagam premiere

Blood Money - ZEE5

Blood Money is a thriller drama starring Priya Bhavani Shankar, Kishore and others. The film revolves around a journalist who has to save two men whose lives are endangered in a Kuwaiti prison. The film is directed by Sarjun KM.

Diary - Aha Tamil

Diary was released in 2022 and is a supernatural mystery thriller film written and directed by debutant Innasi Pandiyan. The film stars Arulnithi, Pavithra Marimuthu, Kishore, Ajay Rathnam and others. The film revolves around a trainee cop who takes up the onus to solve the case of a 16-year-old. Soon, he finds himself caught in a web of lies, supernatural powers and unresolved issues.

Polladhavan – SunNXT

Polladhavan is the directorial debut of Vetrimaaran and features Dhanush in the lead role. The film revolves around a man whose life takes a different and opposite turn after his newly-purchased bike gets stolen. Kishore played the antagonist in the film and was noticed for his performance. Polladhavan also stars Ramya, Daniel Balaji, Santhanam, Karunas and others.

Jayamkondaan – SunNXT

Jayamkondaan is a romantic action drama released in 2008, starring Vinay, Bhavana, Lekha Washington, Vivek, Santhanam, Kishore, Vasundhara Kashyap, Malavika Avinash, and Nizhalgal Ravi, among others. Jayamkondaan follows the life of an NRI who comes back to Chennai only to realise that his late father has a daughter from another woman. As he tries to get along with his half-sister, he realises that there is a bigger force they have to confront.

Modern Love Chennai - Netflix

Also read: Modern Love Chennai: Kishore on working with Bharathiraja, being a romantic & more

Modern Love Chennai is a Tamil anthology film. Kishore, Remya Nambeesan, Vijayalakshmi and others star in Paravai Kootil Vaazhum Maangal, which is directed by Bharathiraja. The segment revolves around a couple with young kids, with the husband wanting his wife to leave him, so that he can move on with his new found love.
